Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/89th
ShortDescription: Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th and Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Halsted/89th.
